org.lfenergy.operatorfabric.springtools.configuration.oauth

Class OAuth2GenericConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lfenergy.operatorfabric.springtools.configuration.oauth.OAuth2GenericConfiguration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OAuth2ReactiveConfiguration

    @Configuration
 @EnableFeignClients
 @EnableCaching
 @EnableDiscoveryClient
 @Import(value={UserServiceCache.class,BusConfiguration.class,UpdateUserEventListener.class,UpdatedUserEvent.class,GroupsProperties.class,GroupsUtils.class,JwtProperties.class})
public class OAuth2GenericConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Common configuration (MVC and Webflux)
